values:
Birthdays, are just normal days. Nothing marks them out from being diffrent from all the other days of a year.
So why dose it matter wakeing up in an empty house. With not even a note or a card left wishing you happy birthday.

So im broke, at the moment and realy need money. Luke offerd me a job handing out leathlets befor. Matt had done it befor so i assumed it was okay and took said job.
Now my arm hurts from holding 400 leathlets and im very tired. I sympathise with these people.
Though saying that im doing it again in two weeks. 
Damn my need for money!

I got this of Magpie and found it ammuseing, so injoy.

<lj-cut text="Political Cows">
SOCIALISM:
You have 2 cows and you give one to your neighbour.

COMMUNISM:
You have 2 cows; the Government takes both and gives you some milk.

FASCISM:
You have 2 cows; the Government takes both and sells you some milk.

NAZISM:
You have 2 cows. The Government takes both and shoots you.

AN AMERICAN CORPORATION:
You have two cows. You sell one, and force the other to produce the milk of four cows. Later, you hire a consultant to analyze why the cow dropped dead.

A FRENCH CORPORATION:
You have two cows. You go on strike because you want three cows.

A JAPANESE CORPORATION:
You have two cows. You redesign them so they are one-tenth the size of an ordinary cow and produce twenty times the milk. You then create a clever cow cartoon image called Cowkimon and market them Worldwide.

A GERMAN CORPORATION:
You have two cows. You reengineer them so they live for 100 years, eat once a month, and milk themselves.

AN ITALIAN CORPORATION:
You have two cows, but you don't know where they are. You break for lunch.

A RUSSIAN CORPORATION:
You have two cows. You count them and learn you have five cows. You count them again and learn you have 42 cows. You count them again and learn you have 2 cows. You stop counting cows.

A SWISS CORPORATION:
You have 5000 cows, none of which belong to you. You charge others for storing them.

A CHINESE CORPORATION:
You have two cows. You have 300 people milking them. You claim full employment, high bovine productivity, and arrest the newsman who reported the numbers.

AN INDIAN CORPORATION:
You have two cows. You worship them.

IRAQI CORPORATION:
Everyone thinks you have lots of cows. You tell them that you have none. No one believes you and they bomb your ass. You still have no cows, but at least now you are part of a Democracy....

SURREALISM:
Surrealism: You have two giraffes. The government requires you to take harmonica lessons

HONG KONG CAPITALISM:
You have 2 cows. You sell 3 of them to your publicly listed company, using letters of credit opened by your brother-in-law at the bank, then execute a debt/equity swap with an associated general offer so that you get all 4 cows back, with a tax deduction for keeping 5 cows. The milk rights of 6 cows are transferred via a Panamanian intermediary to a Cayman Islands company secretly owned by the majority shareholder, who sells the rights to all 7 cows' milk back to the listed company and proceeds from the sale are deferred. The annual report says that the company owns 8 cows, with an option on one more. Meanwhile, you kill the 2 cows because the feng shui is bad
</lj-cut>

Today marks me and matt being together 1/4 of a year.
To some this might not mean much, but to those that know my track record, will also know how fantastic this is. So it makes me happy as i love him. For this i have just booked to take him to see Spiderman 3 on sunday, as i know matt wants to see that.
I have to thank Ais here as if it wast for her i would never meet him.

On the subject of Ais, were are you? You've not been at college for ages, and i miss you. Are you okay? Are you ill? Are you just submerged under a pile of art work????
Come back soon. If your in tomorrow there will be cake!

Its 12;40 am. Im realy tired. In total this week, both school and job wise i have 31 1/2 hours. And this dose not include hanging around betwwen lesson time. Thuse why i am actourly trying to sleep at the moment. But this isnt happening. Why? Simple theres peoples screaming. Hight picked sheaks comeing from far of. I whent out side to lisson as it might have been a trick of my ears. But know there are a number of diffrent voices screaming. Logic tells me that its probly a group of foxes fighting, as they make strange noises. But my minds to creative and tired to focause on logic, so my brain tells me theres ether a horrid crime being comited, or a chemical in the air which is starting to turn people to vombies and thats there inhuman crys. Conclusion I watch to meny horra films. (expect a happyer post later tonight)

For no reson, marks have just started apearing on me. I have huge purple and blue brusise up my thighs. Which are realy quite painful, and i also have a scratch on my jaw. Yet there is notheing i have done in the past few days that would cause any of this.
Im confused.

All course work is now finaly done. Woot. And if any teacher springs more suprise coursework on me. I. Will. Kill. THEM. SLOW. AND. PAINFULY. With that said and done I can finaly get soical again which means must get holp of george and GURPS every sunday. Last saturday I whent up to london with Matt and Sam for Futor sight pre-reslise torniment. This involved wakeing up far to early, getting a strong distaste for lightbulds (dont ask) being made to run up all there staris in an underground (>.<) and meny fun games =). Followed shortly by starvation when the three if use realised we were to bissy to have eaten! But was great fun and i'll do it again. Last night was quict cool, had an email convesation with a freind i hardly get to talk to. (Damn you msn!) And today played 1000 blank white cards, and helped matt with idears for his new card game befor work.

Over the past few days i have been working for to much. As on monday i discoverd i have 2 peaces of course work, worth 30% duo in next monday, this was a realy shock as i hadnt even started and thought i had 2-3 weeks to do them in left. As i planed weeks ago to be bissy this weekend, going with my boyfreind and sam up to London i reay wanted to finish it all befor the weekend. As i dont like letting people down and was looking forward to it. My brain now feels realy disconected. not a nice feeling As i've spent hours and HOURS trying to examin, analise and inturprate the diffrent depositionlat eviroments of 7 diffrent rock types. Sadly we werent told the names or rock types so i cant just google the answer =( Im now nearly finished with one of the progects yay. So i can give it to my teacher tommorw. But im realy dreding he'll say i've layed it out wrong or need to improve huge chunks of it..... -worry- I also just want to curle up prefrbly on matts lap, with him stokeing my hair and wait till my brain stops being strange. So im now going down stairs to watch tv and HOPEFULY get a desent sleep later.

Right so what dose your screan name mean, is there a story behind it? NeonShard The first bit is simple. Neon being a gameing clan i am in and that my freinds run. It only gose it as just 'shard' is normaly taken. Now Shard the more intresting name. For its story im going to use imagory... Now imagion you've just throw a glass agenst a wall in rage/upset (i've done this today shhh, mother need never know). The glase breaks in to shards, dose it not. A shard is a broken, yet in being broken it is so bueatiful (imagion the uneven surface of a glass shard as they reflect the light). A shard is small and delicate looking, to beak it is so easy. Yet everyone worrys about a shard, (think how cairfuly broken glass is cleaned up) as we all know it cuts easly. So this is the meaning od my name, which reflects quite alot about what i see in my reflection. broken, bueatiful, fragial, violent its not often i do these things but this one, i just had to good an image to pain to miss up.

First of its official if i applie for a job i will NEVER get it. Yet work finds me, like my current job. And now randomly today i have been offerd a summer job. The old lady who works the cafey next door to me has just given me work from July to September. Woot! Waitressing, more cooking of lovely food and as its in lewes makes seeing Matt nice and easy to. SO grins all round. Now why was there blood in the title you may ask. Let me explain..... So i was minding my own bisness at work cutting patatos, and something cathches my attention. The knife slips takeing a HUGE chunk out of my finger with it. Now im alown in the shop, ther is no first aid kit, and blood wont stop pooring from my finger. It didnt hurt much, but one chuck of flesh should NOT be able to bleed so much As for zombies thats for tomrrow. Film marthon. Oh and Ais, if your reading this get to seaford station for 1;45pm tomorrow (thursday) as old matt cant get hold of you.

Yes thats right its smaller. Well not realy but it feels shorter. I use to just lie on my bed thinking, and look up at my walls that streached on for miles upwards. Glanceing at pictours as my mind complemplated importat qustions, self debates or just day dreams. Now i lie on my new bed and the sealing looks SO close. I dont like it! >.< I want my just matt on the floor back! But as i just brought a new bed it would be rude to... On the up side it dose look very cool, and hopeful i'll get use to the hight diffrence. -crosses fingers-

I never thought i'd be SO happy to start working again. For one week my walet was empty and i was haveing to withdraw money (which i dislike) but now i have money and food, and cake for matt again yay. Thusday i saw uni freinds, was good but they told me i need to be more evil. Apparently me not being so violant and amuine to pain was creepy.... Funny logic tell me this is the wrong way round. But as the eveing progressed i got back to my "old self". So my personaliy changes depending on who im with subconsiously now it seem. Wow. Today i whent into college at lunch to see matt, which was great though i forgot to go see my teacher. As i WAS going to be droping rocks in acid and timeing them today. Instead me matt and sam played 1000 blank white cards. (more fun then labwork) OH and i know why my internet is fucking up. Now we have unlimited broudband right. Well today i got a letter saying i "had being useing the interntet to much during peak times and they were restrickting my useage". Now tell me since when dose UNLIMITED no longer mean unlimited. Surfice to say I will be changeing provider P.s if anyone knows a good provider PLEASE let me know NOW.

Saturday started out with me shoping for a new bed. My mothers finaly got tired of me sleeping on the floor. But now i have a nice pretty dubble bed comeing in 7 days, woot. Unfortanchly this means i must tidy my bedroom to make space for it... Then Meet up with my wonderful Matt, and had milkshakes and watched 300. Which i DEMAND you all go and see its realy great, and the orical in its realy pretty. Matt thought so also ;) Sunday morning me and Matt whent as always to Sam's for GURPS. Which was realy fun, to make money i got to play around as a tiger most of the session! When i got home, Hannah and Scott appeard for a quick suprised vissit. It was realy nice seeing them both again, expecialy Scott as last time i saw him was newyears? Today is CW its SO bouring AND dull, but i should be over half way done by the end of the day.

Today has been very good, hannah came to vissit lewes. For lunch we went to the grange as a random group of people called us over. Apparently they knew me, but i didnt reconise any of them... Seeing water in the rive both me and hannah chose to make and rase paper boats. Easy said then done. Two people who'd done As physics and are going on to do sciance at uni could not work out how to make paper boats...We were creative and surfise to say thay sank =(. Later today i treated matt out to dinner which was nice, he ended up wearing my coat home. Funny i always thought it was ment to be the other way around. Final, if anyone asks you to go to a meeting on climate change, dont go. They are not intresting, there just a hall of people who thinks that anyone who dosent agree with them are wrong and stupid. It made me feel quite physicly ill, and ruined my great day. Grrr

Since Saturday i have been severly lacking in energy. I just want to curl up and sleep somewere warm. Which is very very bad as i have work just building up. Yet a constant dull ack in my scull prevents sleep. GRRR! My current theory is a mad sciantise has implaneted a devise that stealys my energy to power there creations!!!

Every story has a beging, and in away my life is a story, only i cant flick ahead to see what will happen.

So first post. Want actourly planning on getting one of these till i went to uni, but as Ais has been talking of hers and 'flamy mc flamer', i though i might aswell get one now incase she locks it of as freinds only.

Err not much to report, im currently happy, good job, freinds, boyfreind. So thats all groovy, and hopeful i can keep the journal angst free. And lest see resutlts tomorrow.
